domains.name: graphing-orchestration

domains.name: self_sequences

domains.name: Musical Conductor Orchestration Sequence
domains.description: High-level orchestration flow governing score loading, execution, adaptive dynamics, and session finalization for the musical-conductor subsystem.

domains.name: CAG Agent Workflow - 8 Phase Sequence
domains.description: Complete workflow for an agent operating within the Context-Augmented Generation system. Captures complete context for every workload.

domains.name: Orchestration Audit System Implementation Session
domains.description: Complete workflow for building JSON-first orchestration audit system with auto-generated documentation and diagrams

domains.name: Orchestration Audit System Domain Sequence
domains.description: System-level evolution sequence capturing anti-drift governance workflow for the orchestration audit system itself (meta orchestration).

domains.name: SAFe Continuous Delivery Pipeline
domains.description: Master orchestrator implementing Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe) for continuous delivery. Coordinates all development team activities from idea to production.

phases.name: Movement 1: Continuous Exploration
phases.description: Hypothesis, collaboration, architecture, and vision synthesis

phases.name: Movement 2: Continuous Integration
phases.description: Development, build automation, testing, staging validation, and product owner sign-off

phases.name: Movement 3: Continuous Deployment
phases.description: Production deployment with feature toggles and monitoring

phases.name: Movement 4: Release on Demand
phases.description: Controlled feature releases and outcome measurement

domains.npmScripts: pipeline:delivery:execute, pipeline:delivery:exploration, pipeline:delivery:integration, pipeline:delivery:deployment, pipeline:delivery:release, pipeline:delivery:report

domains.name: Product Owner Sign-off Demo
domains.description: Gating orchestration for product owner validation and feature sign-off. Conducts guided demos in staging environment before production deployment.
domains.description_long: Product owner sign-off demo is a critical gating mechanism in the SAFe Continuous Integration movement (beat 5). It ensures that features have been validated by product owners and receive formal approval before production deployment. This orchestration conducts guided demos, verifies feature acceptance criteria, demonstrates business value, and obtains sign-off.

sketch.title: Product Owner Sign-off Demo
sketch.description: Gating orchestration for product owner validation before production
sketch.role: Demo and approval gate within Continuous Integration

domains.name: RenderX Web Orchestration
domains.description: Master orchestration for RenderX Web application lifecycle. Manages build, test, validation, delivery, telemetry collection, and recovery operations.

phases.name: Movement 1: Initialization
phases.description: Initialize build environment and dependencies

phases.name: Movement 2: Build
phases.description: Execute build with pre-build validation

phases.name: Movement 3: Test & Validation
phases.description: Run E2E tests and compliance checks

phases.name: Movement 4: Delivery
phases.description: Orchestrate deployment to environments

phases.name: Movement 5: Telemetry & Monitoring
phases.description: Collect and instrument observability data

phases.name: Movement 6: Recovery & Resilience
phases.description: Enable failure recovery procedures

domains.name: Build Pipeline Symphony
domains.description: Multi-movement orchestration for comprehensive, traceable, auditable build process with validation, package building, host building, artifact management, and verification.
domains.purpose: Orchestrate builds as symphonic compositions with clear movements, beats, and telemetry tracking for governance and observability

phases.name: Movement 1: Validation & Verification
phases.description: Validate domain definitions, governance rules, and agent behavior

phases.name: Movement 2: Manifest Preparation
phases.description: Generate and prepare manifests and orchestration artifacts

phases.name: Movement 3: Package Building
phases.description: Build all 14 plugin packages in optimized order

phases.name: Movement 4: Host Application Building
phases.description: Build main host application with Vite

phases.name: Movement 5: Artifact Management
phases.description: Process, verify, and catalog all build artifacts

phases.name: Movement 6: Verification & Conformity
phases.description: Run comprehensive verification and conformity checks

domains.name: Symphonia Conformity Alignment Pipeline
domains.description: Three-movement orchestration for automated detection and remediation of orchestration architecture violations across domain definitions, sequences, and handlers.
domains.purpose: Detect and intelligently remediate 60+ conformity violation patterns through automated three-phase alignment fixing with rollback capabilities

phases.name: Movement 1: Domain & Orchestration Alignment
phases.description: Detect and fix domain definition and orchestration misalignments

phases.name: Movement 2: Sequence & Beat Alignment
phases.description: Detect and fix sequence and beat structure misalignments

phases.name: Movement 3: Handler & Process Alignment
phases.description: Detect and fix handler and process symphonic misalignments

domains.npmScripts: pipeline:conformity:execute, pipeline:conformity:phase-1, pipeline:conformity:phase-2, pipeline:conformity:phase-3, pipeline:conformity:phase-4, pipeline:conformity:dry-run, fix:conformity:phase-1, fix:conformity:phase-1b, fix:conformity:phase-2, fix:conformity:phase-3, fix:conformity:phase-4, fix:conformity:all, audit:symphonia:conformity

domains.name: Architecture Governance Enforcement Symphony
domains.description: Multi-movement orchestration that enforces JSON as single source of truth through systematic validation, implementation verification, and auditability across the entire system.
domains.purpose: Ensure that JSON definitions drive all changes - code must conform, tests must validate, markdown must be derived. Every change flows through explicit governance beats with full traceability

phases.name: Movement 1: JSON Schema Validation
phases.description: Validate all JSON files against schema; establish JSON as authoritative

phases.name: Movement 2: Handler Implementation Mapping
phases.description: Verify all beats have handlers and handlers have beats

phases.name: Movement 3: Test Coverage Verification
phases.description: Ensure all beats have test coverage

phases.name: Movement 4: Markdown Consistency
phases.description: Verify markdown documentation is consistent with JSON

phases.name: Movement 5: Auditability & Traceability
phases.description: Establish full change traceability chain

phases.name: Movement 6: Conformity Synthesis
phases.description: Synthesize conformity score and make governance decision

domains.name: Symphonic Code Analysis Pipeline
domains.description: Multi-movement orchestration for comprehensive code analysis of symphonic orchestration codebases, measuring code metrics per beat, test coverage, complexity, and architectural conformity.
domains.purpose: Analyze and visualize symphonic orchestration code quality with per-beat metrics, coverage analysis, complexity scoring, and architecture conformity validation

phases.name: Movement 1: Code Discovery & Beat Mapping
phases.description: Discover source files and map them to orchestration beats

phases.name: Movement 2: Code Metrics Analysis
phases.description: Calculate LOC, complexity, duplication, and maintainability

phases.name: Movement 3: Test Coverage Analysis
phases.description: Measure statement, branch, function, and line coverage

phases.name: Movement 4: Architecture Conformity & Reporting
phases.description: Validate handler mapping, generate reports and trends

domains.name: Symphonic Code Analysis Demo
domains.description: Demo and review gate for symphonic code analysis results. Presents analysis findings, metrics trends, and architectural conformity to stakeholders for review and approval before publication.
domains.purpose: Enable architecture review teams to validate code analysis results, discuss findings, and approve metrics before governance enforcement
domains.description_long: Symphonic Code Analysis Demo is a critical review and approval gate following the Symphonic Code Analysis Pipeline. It enables architecture review teams to examine code metrics, discuss trends and findings with stakeholders, and formally approve results before they're used for governance enforcement.

sketch.title: Symphonic Code Analysis Demo
sketch.description: Stakeholder review and approval gate for code analysis results
sketch.role: Demo and review gate within code analysis workflow

domains.name: Orchestration Registry Audit Pipeline
domains.description: Audit orchestration to validate that all registered orchestration domains have both JSON authority files and npm scripts defined. Produces completeness reports and governance compliance verification.
domains.purpose: Ensure all orchestration domains meet the governance requirement: each domain must have a JSON authority file (sequenceFile) and a set of executable npm scripts (npmScripts).

phases.description: Discover all registered orchestration domains and their current state
phases.name: Discovery & Inventory

phases.description: Validate that all domains have both sequence files and npm scripts
phases.name: Validation & Completeness Check

phases.description: Analyze completeness metrics and generate compliance report
phases.name: Analysis & Metrics

phases.description: Generate audit report and governance compliance documentation
phases.name: Reporting & Documentation

domains.name: Host SDK Infrastructure
domains.description: Core Host SDK providing the plugin hosting environment, manifest management, and integration APIs for all UI components

domains.name: Manifest Tools Infrastructure
domains.description: Manifest generation and validation tools for orchestration domain definitions, sequence specifications, and plugin registrations

domains.name: Components Library Infrastructure
domains.description: Foundational component library providing base UI components and utility wrappers for all RenderX plugins

domains.name: Digital Assets Infrastructure
domains.description: Asset management system for icons, themes, branding, and static resources used across all UI plugins
